<#include "fragment/page_nav"> <#include "fragment/page_header"> <#include "fragment/page_aside"> <#include "fragment/page_footer"> <#include "fragment/page_article"> <#include "index.global">${model.response.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8")}<#if action??> <#assign page_overview_content><#include "action/"+action><@html_content/> <#else><#assign page_overview_content><#include "fragment/page_overview"> <#if isCacheableResponse()><#assign rawoutput><@html_content/>${model.app.template.compress("html",rawoutput)}<#else><@html_content/><#macro html_content> <@page_header_title/> <#if html_header??><@html_header/>
<@page_header/>
<@page_breadcrumb/>
${page_overview_content}
